bestBHT.bht: And that one showed them a large upper room furnished for the Passover. The words design the preparation of the Passover, and everything proper for it.

Marvin Vincent: Furnished. See on Mark 14:15. Wyc., strewed.
Archibald T. Robertson: And he (κ'ακεινος). Κα and εκεινος (χρασις) where Mark 14:15 has κα αυτος. Literally, And that one. See on Mark for rest of the verse.
John Gill: And he shall show you a large upper room furnished...
...the words design the preparation of the passover, and every thing proper for it.

And that one showed them a large upper room furnished for the Passover. The words design the preparation of the Passover, and everything proper for it.
And that one (κ'ακεινος) showed them a large upper room furnished for the Passover. The words imply the careful preparation of the Passover feast with all necessary provisions and arrangements made.

And that one (κ'ακεινος) showed them a large upper room furnished for the Passover. The words design the preparation of the Passover, and everything proper for it. The careful preparation of the Passover feast with all necessary provisions and arrangements made is implied.
